message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $9,500.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $8,200 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to be flexible to make this work. How about we settle on $9,000?
I'm getting close, but I think we can do even better. How about $8,500? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm still trying to keep costs down.
